Name: Aberration
About the game: Aberration, a Point & Click thriller experience that leads you down a rabbit hole of suspense, fear and misdirection. Mystery Your name is Nick Stone, a detective investigating a shocking murder which has you travelling to multiple locations. Roam through the creaking halls of an abandoned mansion, with secrets buried in the walls. Trudge through a muddied farm property and find what's hidden amongst the hay. Explore your own house and its eerie quiet. Atmosphere & Puzzles Story-driven, stylised and atmospheric, Aberration is a puzzle solving game at its heart. You'll need your wits about you, and the ability to think outside the box to uncover the truth. Look for the out of place. Listen out for creaking footsteps that aren't yours... Point & Click Gameplay is streamlined to be simple to play, with no obstructive contextual menu's. Left click will examine, and right click will interact.
